Articles.Content:
Never introduced myself, So here we are, Hello everyone.

Gamer, Nerd, Flight nut

Really I\'m a rotor head which is why I\'m sure most of my later creations will be VTOL

Love the game, Love the atmosphere here a good mix of people that don\'t generally seem to be total rubes, Its a nice change

Anyway, Hi-ya I\'m Ryn and there isn\'t too much else to say

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
